intro.speaker: Old Woman
intro.line: Run, Mozu! Please, dear! Run and don't look back!

intro.speaker: Mozu
intro.line: Mother, no! Take my hand! We'll run together!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Did you hear that?! Those screams! Something terrible is happening!

intro.speaker: Felicia/Jakob
intro.line: We've got trouble, all right! This village is under attack by the Faceless. But this place has been ravaged. We're too late!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: No! There must be some survivors. With any luck, some people escaped, but if there's even one left here somewhere... Let's get searching everyone!

battle.speaker: Mozu
battle.line: M-M-Mother... My village... They're all dead... I'm alone. Nowhere to go! And those monsters... They're coming back for me...

recruit-talk.speaker: Mozu
recruit-talk.line: Waugh! No! My mother... My friends...

recruit-talk.speaker: Corrin
recruit-talk.line: I'm here to help. Where are they?

recruit-talk.speaker: Mozu
recruit-talk.line: My mother wouldn't take my hand. She's... she's...

recruit-talk.speaker: Corrin
recruit-talk.line: I'm so sorry. But there's no time to grieve. Not now. Stay behind me. I'll keep you safe.

recruit-talk.speaker: Mozu
recruit-talk.line: No! I have to fight! For Mother! For all my friends! For everything those monsters took from me!

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: All right. We've finished off the last of the Faceless.

end.speaker: Mozu
end.line: ... Um, but what do I do? They took my Mother... My life.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: You must have some family near here. We'll be glad to take you there.

end.speaker: Mozu
end.line: There's no one. I couldn't even start over here by myself. All the homes, fields... It's all destroyed. But I wouldn't want to stay here even if it wasn't. Everyone I called family is dead. Every house... a grave.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Listen, we'll take you in. We can't replace all those you've lost. But we'll take care of you.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Yes, but only until we find you a safe place to call home. Our group... a family of sorts... is bound by a dangerous cause. We go from one battle to the next, ever in peril. That's no life for you.

end.speaker: Mozu
end.line: I'm not afraid. I can help. I might even save you or your friends. Let me join your cause, whatever it is. I'll keep your family safe.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Yes, of course. I have to admit, you sound just like one of us already.

end.speaker: Mozu
end.line: I'll do my best. And I'll stay safe. After all, Mother's watching over me now.
